name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Farewell
name_original: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Farewell
description:
Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Farewell is an adventure game. It was originally released in 2018. On review aggregator Metacritic, Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Farewell has a score of 80. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Farewell is available on PC.
